授業目的: This course further develops skills acquired in English A III. The focus is on English reading and writing for academic purposes with a special emphasis on developing critical thinking along with language skills. Students will continue to sharpen reading strategies, learn academic vocabulary words and review grammar for use in writing assignments.
到達目標: By the end of this course, students will have acquired the ability to use academic vocabulary and advanced grammar for written English. These skills will be applied in organizing, researching, and writing a multi-paragraph research paper. Students will also gain analytical and critical tools to apply to the reading of academic materials in English.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This course will be held in-person on campus unless emergency events related to the pandemic force a change of format. General features: Discussion, guided skills-development exercises, written and oral feedback on assignments.
